body:
We don't have to do (a), but we should do (b) and cover the general case.

People will get the repo from elsewhere. git-review can just set up their repo to track the right upstream branch (go.googlesource.com).

I'm fine if it fails with an error, but the error should be the `git remote .... && git-review sync` command that they need to run to switch to the right repo. (without doing a new clone)
